get.summary:
Retrieves document information for document at provided URL.
Retrieves file from specified URL and tries to detect file type when fileName parameter is not specified.
Saves retrieved file in storage. Use fileName and folder parameters to specify desired file name and folder to save file.
When file with specified name already exists in storage new unique file name will be used for file.

parameters.name: Url
parameters.description: The URL to retrieve document.

parameters.name: FileName
parameters.description: The file name.

parameters.name: Password
parameters.description: The document password.

parameters.name: RenderComments
parameters.description: Allows to render document comments. Not required if PDF document was created before.

parameters.name: RenderHiddenPages
parameters.description: Enables document hidden pages, sheets or slides rendering.

parameters.name: Folder
parameters.description: The folder which contains specified file in storage.

parameters.name: Storage
parameters.description: The file storage which have to be used.

200.description: The object that contains information about file format and file size. Includes information about document pages and attachments.

post.summary:
Retrieves document information for posted document.
Content with document or multipart content is expected where first part is document and second is DocumentInfoOptions.
Saves file in storage. Use fileName and folder parameters to specify desired file name and folder to save file.
When file with specified name already exists in storage new unique file name will be used for file.

parameters.name: FileName
parameters.description: The file name.

parameters.name: Folder
parameters.description: The folder which contains specified file in storage.

parameters.name: File
parameters.description: File contents.

parameters.name: DocumentInfoOptions
parameters.description: Document info options 'DocumentInfoOptions' as JSON or XML.

parameters.name: Storage
parameters.description: The file storage which have to be used.

200.description: The object that contains information about file format and file size. Includes information about document pages and attachments.

put.summary:
Retrieves document information for document at provided URL.
Retrieves file from specified URL and tries to detect file type when fileName parameter is not specified.
Saves retrieved file in storage. Use fileName and folder parameters to specify desired file name and folder to save file.
When file with specified name already exists in storage new unique file name will be used for file.

parameters.name: Url
parameters.description: The URL to retrieve document.

parameters.name: DocumentInfoOptions
parameters.description: The rendering options.

parameters.name: FileName
parameters.description: The document name.

parameters.name: Folder
parameters.description: The folder which contains specified file in storage.

parameters.name: Storage
parameters.description: The file storage which have to be used.

200.description: The object that contains information about file format and file size. Includes information about document pages and attachments.

Creates PDF document from document passed in request body and saves it in cache.
Content with document or multipart content is expected where first part is document and second is PdfFileOptions.

When file with specified name already exists in storage new unique file name will be used for file.

Creates PDF document for document at provided URL and saves it in cache.

Saves retrieved file in storage. Use fileName and folder parameters to specify desired file name and folder to save file.
When file with specified name already exists in storage new unique file name will be used for file.

post.summary:
Retrieves document information with specified options.
Expects DocumentInfoOptions object data in request body.

parameters.name: FileName
parameters.description: The file name.

parameters.name: DocumentInfoOptions
parameters.description: The rendering options.

parameters.name: Folder
parameters.description: The folder which contains specified file in storage.

parameters.name: Storage
parameters.description: The file storage which have to be used.

200.description: The object that contains information about file format and size, document pages and attachments.

get.summary:
Retrieves document information for document at provided URL.
Retrieves file from specified URL and tries to detect file type when fileName parameter is not specified.
Saves retrieved file in storage. Use fileName and folder parameters to specify desired file name and folder to save file.
When file with specified name already exists in storage new unique file name will be used for file.

parameters.name: Url
parameters.description: The URL to retrieve document.

parameters.name: FileName
parameters.description: The file name.

parameters.name: Password
parameters.description: The document password.

parameters.name: ExtractText
parameters.description: When this options is set to true text contained in document will be extracted and returned along with other information.

parameters.name: RenderComments
parameters.description: Allows to render document comments. Not required if PDF document was created before.

parameters.name: RenderHiddenPages
parameters.description: Enables document hidden pages, sheets or slides rendering.

parameters.name: Folder
parameters.description: The folder which contains specified file in storage.

parameters.name: Storage
parameters.description: The file storage which have to be used.

200.description: The object that contains information about file format and file size. Includes information about document pages and attachments.

post.summary:
Retrieves document information for posted document.
Content with document or multipart content is expected where first part is document and second is DocumentInfoOptions.
Saves file in storage. Use fileName and folder parameters to specify desired file name and folder to save file.
When file with specified name already exists in storage new unique file name will be used for file.

parameters.name: FileName
parameters.description: The document name.

parameters.name: Folder
parameters.description: The folder which contains specified file in storage.

parameters.name: File
parameters.description: File contents.

parameters.name: DocumentInfoOptions
parameters.description: Document info options 'DocumentInfoOptions' as JSON or XML.

parameters.name: Storage
parameters.description: The file storage which have to be used.

200.description: The object that contains information about file format and file size. Includes information about document pages and attachments.

put.summary:
Retrieves document information for document at provided URL.
Retrieves file from specified URL and tries to detect file type when fileName parameter is not specified.
Saves retrieved file in storage. Use fileName and folder parameters to specify desired file name and folder to save file.
When file with specified name already exists in storage new unique file name will be used for file.

get.summary: Retrieves list of document pages as image.

parameters.name: FileName
parameters.description: The file name.

parameters.name: Format
parameters.description: The image format (jpg, png or bmp). Default value is png.

parameters.name: Width
parameters.description: The image width.

parameters.name: Height
parameters.description: The image height.

parameters.name: Quality
parameters.description: The image quality for jpg format. Default value is 90.

parameters.name: StartPageNumber
parameters.description: The starting document page number to render.

parameters.name: CountPages
parameters.description: The count of document pages to render.

parameters.name: Password
parameters.description: The document password.

parameters.name: ExtractText
parameters.description: When this options is set to true text contained in document will be extracted and returned along with other information.

parameters.name: RenderComments
parameters.description: Allows to render document comments.

parameters.name: RenderHiddenPages
parameters.description: Enables document hidden pages, sheets or slides rendering.

parameters.name: DefaultFontName
parameters.description: The name of the default font.

parameters.name: FontsFolder
parameters.description: The folder with custom fonts in storage.

parameters.name: Folder
parameters.description: The folder which contains specified file in storage.

parameters.name: Storage
parameters.description: The file storage which have to be used.

200.description: Object which contains list of links to document pages as images.

post.summary:
Creates document pages as image and saves them in cache. 
Pages created before will be removed from cache.

parameters.description: The file storage which have to be used.

Downloads document at provided URL as PDF. 
Document will be retrieved from the passed URL and added to Storage.

post.summary:
Creates PDF document from document passed in request body and saves it in cache.
Content with document or multipart content is expected where first part is document and second is PdfFileOptions.
Saves retrieved file in storage. Use fileName and folder parameters to specify desired file name and folder to save file.
When file with specified name already exists in storage new unique file name will be used for file.

parameters.name: FileName
parameters.description: The file name.

parameters.name: FontsFolder

parameters.description: File contents.

parameters.name: PdfFileOptions
parameters.description: PDF rendering options 'PdfFileOptions' as JSON or XML.

parameters.name: Storage
parameters.description: The file storage which have to be used.

201.description: Object which contains information about newly created PDF document or actual PDF document when "application/pdf" accept header specified returned along with '201 Created' status.

put.summary:
Creates PDF document for document at provided URL and saves it in cache. 
Retrieves file from specified URL and tries to detect file type when fileName parameter is not specified.
Saves retrieved file in storage. Use fileName and folder parameters to specify desired file name and folder to save file.
When file with specified name already exists in storage new unique file name will be used for file.
Expects PdfFileOptions object data in request body.

parameters.name: Url
parameters.description: The URL to retrieve document.

parameters.name: PdfFileOptions
parameters.description: The PDF file rendering options.

parameters.name: FileName
parameters.description: The file name.

parameters.name: FontsFolder
parameters.description: The folder with custom fonts in storage.

parameters.name: Folder
parameters.description: The folder which contains specified file in storage.

parameters.name: Storage
parameters.description: The file storage which have to be used.

201.description: Object which contains information about newly created PDF document along with '201 Created' status.

FormatCollection.description: Describes object which contains list of supported file formats.

DocumentInfoOptions.description: Provides options for retrieving document information.

Password.description: Allows to specify document password in case when document is password-protected.

AttachmentPassword.description: Allows to specify attachment password in case when attachment is password-protected.

ExtractText.description: Enables document text extraction. For rendering document as image only.

RenderHiddenPages.description: Enables document hidden pages, sheets or slides rendering.

Transforms.description:
Transforms to apply.
Available transforms ["Rotate","Reorder","AddPrintAction"].
Rotate - Pages will be rotated on angle if angle was set before.
Reorder - For rendering document as PDF only. Pages will be ordered according to rearrangements made before.
AddPrintAction - For rendering document as PDF only. An JavaScript action will be added which opens print dialog when PDF document is opened.

DefaultFontName.description:
The name of the default font.
Default font name may be specified in following cases:
- You want to generally specify the default font to fall back on, if particular font
  in the document cannot be found during rendering.
- Your document uses fonts, that contain non-English characters and you want to make sure
  any missing font is replaced with one that has the same character set available.

Color.description:
The watermark color.
Supported formats {Magenta|(112,222,11)|(50,112,222,11)}.
Default value is "Red".

Position.description:
The watermark position.
Supported positions {Diagonal|TopLeft|TopCenter|TopRight|BottomLeft|BottomCenter|BottomRight}.
Default value is "Diagonal".

Size.description:
Watermark size in percents.
Default value is 100.

Watermark.description: Provides options to configure watermark appearance.

RenderGridLines.description: Indicates whether to render grid lines.

PaginateSheets.description:
Allows to enable worksheets pagination.
By default one worksheet is rendered into one page.

CountRowsPerPage.description:
The number of rows rendered into one page when PaginateSheets = true.
Default value is 50.

IgnoreEmptyRows.description: Indicates whether empty rows should be ignored.

InternalHyperlinkPrefix.description:
Prefix for hyper-link that references worksheet inside the same document.
For rendering document as HTML only.

TextOverflowMode.description:
Text overflow mode applied when the text is too big to fit into the cell.
Supported modes {Overlay|OverlayIfNextIsEmpty|HideText}.
Overlay - Overlay next cells even they are not empty.
OverlayIfNextIsEmpty - Overlay next cells only if they are not empty
HideText - Hide overflow text
Default value is OverlayIfNextIsEmpty.

ScaleFactor.description: The scale factor affects the size of an output document.

Width.description: The width of the render result in pixels.

Height.description: The height of the render result in pixels.

RenderLayouts.description: Indicates whether layouts from CAD document should be rendered.

LayoutName.description: The name of the specific layout to render.

RenderTrackedChanges.description: Indicates whether Tracked Changes (Revisions) should be rendered or not.

EnablePreciseRendering.description:
Indicates whether the PDF document is rendered in a precise mode or not.
It is recommended to enable this option when rendering documents with complex content
e.g. documents which contains hieroglyphs or any kind o glyphs which should be rendered separately
from each other.

EnableInitialContentOrdering.description:
When this option is enabled content (graphics and text)
will be added to HTML document accordingly Z-order in original PDF document.
When this option is disabled content (graphics and text) will be added to a single layer.

RenderLayersSeparately.description: When this option is enabled layers will be separated from each other in the HTML document.

RenderNotes.description: Indicates whether slide notes should be rendered.

FileResponse.description: The empty type used as a flag.

Name.description: HTML resource (image, style, graphics or font) file name.

ResourcePath.description:
Allows to specify HTML resources (styles, images and fonts) path.
For example when resource path is http://example.com/api/pages/{page-number}/resources/{resource-name}
the {page-number} and {resource-name} templates will be replaced with page number and resource name accordingly.
Ignored when EmbedResources option is set to true.

IgnoreResourcePathInResources.description:
Allows to ignore ResourcePath when processing *.css files. 
When this options is enabled ResourcePath won't be added to resource references in *.css file.

EmbedResources.description:
Controls output HTML document resources (styles, images and fonts) saving.
When this options set to true all resources will be embedded into HTML document and ResourcePath option value will be ignored.

HtmlOptions.description: Provides options for rendering document pages as HTML.

StartPageNumber.description: Allows to specify document page number as starting page to render.

CountPages.description: Allows to specify count of document pages to render.

Password.description: Allows to specify document password in case when document is password-protected.

NewPosition.description: The position where page should be placed.

ReorderOptions.description: Provides options for reordering document pages.

Angle.description: The angle in degrees to which the page should be rotated.

RotateOptions.description: Provides options for rotating document pages.

PdfFileOptions.description: Provides options for rendering document as PDF.

Format.description:
Allows to set image format (png, jpg, bmp).
Default value is png.

Quality.description:
Allows to specify quality when rendering as JPG.
Valid values are between 1 and 100. 
Default value is 90.

Width.description:
Allows to specify output image width. 
Specify image width in case when you want to change output image dimensions.
When Width has value and Height value is 0 then Height value will be calculated 
to save image proportions.

Height.description:
Allows to specify output image height. 
Specify image height in case when you want to change output image dimensions.
When Height has value and Width value is 0 then Width value will be calculated 
to save image proportions.

ImageOptions.description: Provides options for rendering document as image.
